job.title: Software Quality Engineer II
job.description: strongOur PurposebrbrstrongWe work to connect and power an inclusive digital economy that benefits everyone everywhere by making transactions safe simple smart and accessible Using secure data and networks partnerships and passion our innovations and solutions help individuals financial institutions governments and businesses realize their greatest potential Our decency quotient or DQ drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths views and experiences We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team  one that makes better decisions drives innovation and delivers better business resultsbrbrstrongJob TitlebrbrstrongSoftware Quality Engineer IIbrbrWho is MastercardbrbrWe are the global technology company behind the worlds fastest payments processing network We are a vehicle for commerce a connection to financial systems for the previously excluded a technology innovation lab and the home of Priceless We ensure every employee has the opportunity to be a part of something bigger and to change lives We believe as our company grows so should you We believe in connecting everyone to endless priceless possibilitiesbrbrData amp Services within MastercardbrbrThe Data amp Services team is a key differentiator for Mastercard providing the cuttingedge services that help our customers grow Focused on thinking big and scaling fast around the globe this agile team is responsible for endtoend solutions for a diverse global customer base Centered on datadriven technologies and innovation these services include predictive analytics data visualization and business intelligence softwarebrbrSoftware Quality Engineer II Data amp Services Technology TeambrbrAs a Software Quality Engineer on the DampS Technology team youll hold a valued role within a rapidly growing team inside one of the worlds most successful organizations working closely with experienced and driven technologists to solve problems as a team Mastercards DampS next generation platform blends industryleading analytics advanced software architecture and the latest web technologies to face these problems analyzing terabytes of data in the process Our software is required to effectively decipher analytically complex insights from these problems on which businesses base multimillion dollar business decisionsbrbrAs a member of the Business Operations Engineering team you will bring your creativity and detailoriented mindset together to test key internal resources that drive value to our Delivery Sales Marketing Engineering teams and beyond We work with cuttingedge technologies with our engineers determining the best one for each project You are responsible for ensuring great products and should never settle for the status quo  you approach testing challenges with a fresh perspective and look for ways to accelerate or improve the testing tactics takenbrbrSoftware Quality Engineers work sidebyside with Software Development Engineers on small flexible teams There are no rigid organizational structures and each team uses processes that work the best for that team and their projectsbrbrEnjoy collaboratively solving complex technical challenges Come solve them with usbrbrstronguPosition ResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongAs a member of the Business Operations Engineering team you will you will test functionality and tools that drive value across the organizationbrbrstronguAs a Software Quality Engineer II You WillbrbrustrongOwn quality of the entire development process from ideation through releasebrbrLead testing of large complex highquality features with minimal oversightbrbrManage and coordinate large testing and release efforts with continuous deliverybrbrDevelop maintain and enhance automated testing processesbrbrInnovate and continually learn and work with new technologiesbrbrInvest in personal growth and take on team responsibilitiesbrbrHave the opportunity to write code to help the team achieve their quality goalsbrbrstronguIdeal Candidate QualificationsbrbrustrongExperience as a QA engineer Software Engineer in Test Test Automation engineer Developer or related occupation leveraging software QA tools and processesbrbrExperience testing web applications in an agile production environmentbrbrFamiliar with objectoriented programming microservice development and databasesbrbrComfortable with one or more programming languagestesting frameworksbrbrPassion for problem solvingbrbrMotivation creativity selfdirection and desire to thrive on small project teamsbrbrStrong written and verbal English communication skillsbrbrExperience collaborating with diverse crossfunctional teamsbrbrDue to COVID19 most of our employees are working from home Weve implemented a virtual hiring process and continue to interview candidates by phone or video and are onboarding new hires remotely We value the safety
